introduction:
Passionate and always fascinated by computer development, I undertook a professional reconversion in the computer development.
With my various experiences radiating around the Angular framework, I decided to get started as Freelance

capgemini.title: Senior web developer
capgemini.content: Following a mission as a provider for Capgemini, I chose to integrate the company directly.

creative.title: Web developer
creative.content: Arrived at Creative, I worked at Sopra Steria for the CNAMTS in AngularJS and at Capgemini for a client in the French luxury retail sector.

sqli.title: Web developer
sqli.content: Hired on profile, I worked internally on various missions, technologies and frameworks.

cgi.title: Web developer (trainee)
cgi.content: Following my training at ENI, I realized in CGI a hybrid mobile application with Ionic 1.

design.title: Design
design.subtitle: Material Design
design.content:
With the IT, I'm still attached to the rendering graphic of the application or site I created.
If no rule is imposed on me, I let my imagination wander while inspiring me with what already exists on the net.

i18n.title: I18n
i18n.subtitle: Internationalization
i18n.content: Because the websites are intended to be visible all over the world, I took to heart to use internationalization tools as Angular's own xliff files and ngxTranslate library.

responsive.title: Responsive
responsive.subtitle: Multi Devices Adaptation
responsive.content: At the time of the explosion of the Internet mobile, websites must be able to display on any support. To do this I use the responsiveDesign and the concept of mobileFirst appropriately.

a11y.title: A11y
a11y.subtitle: Accessibility
a11y.content: Improving the accessibility of your website will reach a wider audience, increase traffic and conversions on your site. site. Always be aware that between 15% and 20% of the population suffer from a handicap: visual, auditory, motor ...

contact.title: Contact
contact.content:
Need a dynamic and ambitious collaborator, want to know me a little more or to recruit me?

You will find all the following information.

You can download my business card in vCard format, to easily add me to your address book, send me an e-mail or contact me directly by phone

I promise to answer you within 24 hours.
